author: r0f1
title: Ask HN: Is now a good time to invest in ETFs?
description: There was a huge drop in all major indices. Is now a good time to invest in exchange traded funds? Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=22723957 Points: 8 # Comments: 3
content:
Nope, SP 500 is back to what it was in end or 2017 beginning of 20181. Do you really think the economy is as good as it is in 2018?
2. Do you think we are in the beginning, middle, or end of this outbreak?
3. Will the virus come back after this summer? This… [+844 chars]
